entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
